resources.string: Shri Bhikabhai G.Patel, Managing Director of Gp Crop Care has having 30 Years Experience of Manufacturing & Marketing, Gujarat Pesticides (An ISO 9001:2008 CERTIFIED COMPANY) established in the year 1983 and manufacturing right from beginning. The company has Moto of "Service to Agriculture" with the Passion for quality and serving. Gp has a large in-house formulation Plant with fully automated and semi-automated lines for producing assorted products in HDPE, Pet,Polyester, Tin and Aluminium Packs.
